definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Note that food is served from the left and empty plates are cleared from the right.
sentences.chinese: 注意每道菜都是從左邊端上來，空盤子從右邊撤下去。

sentences.english: The hostess ladled out a bowl of tomato soup.
sentences.chinese: 女主人端上了一碗番茄湯。

sentences.english: The cabbage end up hilly one dish, bowl like a small bowl.
sentences.chinese: 那白菜端上來小山似的一盤，碗象個小盆。

sentences.english: In the communal kitchen, Kostya’s mother served tea and condensed milk.
sentences.chinese: 在公用廚房裏，克斯特亞的母親端上了茶和煉乳。

sentences.english: Dishes of bouillon were brought in hot and hot.
sentences.chinese: 一道道熱氣騰騰的肉湯被端上來了。

sentences.english: A pot of lip smacking clay pot beef soup is ready to be served.
sentences.chinese: 一鍋熱騰騰的砂煲牛肉湯終於可以端上了。

sentences.english: The soup is eaten and then a dish of potatoes fried with bacon is brought on.
sentences.chinese: 喝過湯後，又端上來一盤馬鈴薯煎培根。

sentences.english: In fact, at a banquet it is customary to serve the whole fishlast, pointed toward the guest of honor.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，宴會的習俗是最後端上整魚，魚頭對着貴賓。

sentences.english: Ellen said as she happily set a bowl of mashed potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 艾倫說，高高興興地端上來一盆土豆泥。

sentences.english: Hangzhou Jiang Ya (Hangzhou Roasted Duck) was the first dish to show up.
sentences.chinese: 杭州醬鴨是第一道端上來的菜。

sentences.english: The potato is served in an ovenproof bowl.
sentences.chinese: 土豆是盛在耐熱碗裏端上來的。

sentences.english: At last coffee is brought in, and the gentlemen are summoned.
sentences.chinese: 最後端上了咖啡，男賓們都被請了進來。

sentences.english: After a while, the service person has come up a fruit tray for that Japanese end.
sentences.chinese: 過了一會兒，服務員給那個日本人端上來一個果盤。

sentences.english: The meat is served with salad or assorted vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 端上的肉配有色拉或雜菜。

sentences.english: Can observe the spicy pot of bottom that the chafing dish terminal inside the store comes up secondly.
sentences.chinese: 其次，可以觀察火鍋店內端上來的麻辣鍋底。

definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
food and drink/food to accompany wine
to smell, look and taste great
tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
appetizer/small side dish/easy job/piece of cake/see also 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
